name: Camera message system
send pic text
data: {	   "title": msg.title,	   "message": msg.event & " on " & msg.message,	   "data":{	       "image":"/media/local/camera/" & msg.driveFolder & "/snap" & msg.count & ".jpg",	       "clickAction":"/lovelace-test/markdown",	       "ttl":0,	       "priority":"high"	   }	}
